channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘They were very happy’: Russian mother defends decision to live with two daughters in remote Indian cave
Nvidia Gets US Green Light to Sell H20 AI Chips to China
How Melania Trump emerged as one of Zelensky’s key allies in the White House
Kremlin says Trump statements on Russia and Putin are serious, require analysis
Mike Waltz to face grilling over Signal chat at Senate hearing for UN role
item.description: Mike Waltz will face questioning from lawmakers for the first time since he was ousted as national security adviser

item.title: A Florida county leads the way with a high-tech 911 system that improves emergency response
item.description: Collier County, Florida, uses one of the most advanced 911 systems in the U.S., allowing callers to send texts and videos

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Monday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Monday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 08-12-45-46-63, Powerball: 24

item.title: Murder trial begins for Colorado dentist accused of poisoning wife's protein shakes
item.description: A Colorado dentist accused of killing his wife of 23 years by poisoning her protein shakes begins trial with opening arguments this week

item.title: Florida man who killed 2 people outside a bar is scheduled to be executed
item.description: A man convicted of fatally shooting a man and woman outside a Florida bar as part of an attempted revenge killing is scheduled to be executed
